product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Benetint Cheek & Lip Stain (6mL)
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content:
I am obsessed with benefits brow and lash products, and use them exclusively, do I decided to give this product a try. Since this is purely liquid, a little goes a long way and it is incredibly pigmented. I have really fair skin so I use one or two drops on my cheeks and rub it in slightly with my fingers. The result is a much more natural dewy looking pink tint than with a pressed powder or cream/stick blush. I also use this on my lips and one light swipe is enough to instantly stain the lips. However this product makes lips extremely red and leaves them very dry. I recommend using a balm on your lips under this before applying.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Benetint Cheek & Lip Stain (6mL)
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I’ve heard and seen this at Sephora many times but had always chose a different brand/product over it. I don’t know why I never gave this a chance but I finally did! This is the best lip tint EVER! It gives you a natural rosy/red lip. It’s not a gloss finish (which I dislike) so no sticky feeling or product balling up! The product smells like roses too! It’s liquid, like water and when applied it just seeps and blends into your lip. I like to apply a normal lip balm first and then apply the Benetint in the center of top and bottom lip for the Korean faded lip look. The product is also buildable if you want more color. I have not tried this product on my cheeks...I don’t think I will, I only wanted this for my lips.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Benetint Cheek & Lip Stain (6mL)
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I can’t comment on this product as a cheek stain, as I primarily purchased this to try and replace the lip stain I am currently using (from an MLM company). Unfortunately it just doesn’t measure up. The colour is nice, but the product is very watery (as opposed to more of a gel texture) making it very difficult to apply, and difficult to build any colour. Staying power is quite poor, and the coverage is very blotchy (even when I exfoliate my lips). I really wanted to ditch this product so I could stop supporting MLMs, but I guess I will be going back.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Benetint Cheek & Lip Stain (6mL)
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content:
This is the best lip stain I have ever used. I have tried a ton of different brands, but this one is the best one for me. It is basically a liquid, so it goes on very easily. You can put chapstick over it without it smudging or wearing away. It doesn't taste bad, and it smells like rose water. Since its just a tinted liquid, you can either make it very light and natural by just putting a little bit on and smudging it around, or you can make it very dark by putting on a few coats and letting it dry in between. I'm in love with it and will definitely buy more when I run out.
